system: RESPOND ONLY WITH VALID JSON. NOTHING ELSE.
user: Buat query SQL untuk kebutuhan: "<REQUEST>" dan skema tabel: <TABLE_SCHEMA>. Skema output: {"query":"string","estimated_cost_notes":"string|null"}.
example_input: Request: Ambil 10 user aktif terakhir; Table schema: users(id, name, last_active, status)

example_output.query: SELECT id,name FROM users WHERE status='active' ORDER BY last_active DESC LIMIT 10;
